Wisdom: الْكَلَامُ فِي وَثَاقِكَ مَا لَمْ تَتَكَلَّمْ بِهِ فَإِذَا تَكَلَّمْتَ بِهِ صِرْتَ فِي وَثَاقِهِ
enWisdom: Speech is in your control as long as you have not uttered it, but once you utter it you become shackled by it

Wisdom: الْأَقَاوِيلُ مَحْفُوظَةٌ وَالسَّرَائِرُ مَبْلُوَّةٌ وَكُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِما كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
enWisdom: Utterances are recorded, secrets are [going to be] revealed and every soul is held hostage by what it has earned

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْقَوْلِ مَا نَقَضَ بَعْضُهُ بَعْضاً
enWisdom: The worst speech is that which contradicts itself
For every situation there is an appropriate thing to say

Wisdom: مَنْ قَالَ مَا لَا يَنْبَغِي سَمِعَ مَا لَا يَشْتَهِي
enWisdom: One who speaks that which he ought not to, hears that which he does not like

Wisdom: مِنْ عَقْلِ الرَّجُلِ أَنْ لَا يَتَكَلَّمَ بِجَمِيعِ [بِكُلِ‏] مَا أَحَاطَ بِهِ عِلْمُهُ
enWisdom: It is from the intelligence of a man that he not speak about all that he knows
A discourteous reply stems from a discourteous address
Never say anything the reply for which will hurt you
Do not speak that which you fear others will consider a lie

Wisdom: لَا تُصَدِّقْ مَنْ يُقَابِلُ صِدْقَكَ بِتَكْذِيبِهِ
enWisdom: Do not tell the truth to one who responds to your truth by denying [and belying] it

Wisdom: لَا تَتَكَلَّمْ بِكُلِّ مَا تَعْلَمُ فَكَفَى بِذَلِكَ جَهْلًا
enWisdom: Do not speak of everything you know, for that is [itself] a sufficient ignorance
Do not say that which will make your burden [of sin] heavy

Wisdom: لَا تَتَكَلَّمَنَّ إِذَا لَمْ تَجِدْ لِلْكَلَامِ مَوْقِعاً
enWisdom: Never speak when you cannot find an appropriate situation to speak

Wisdom: لَا تُقَاوِلَنَّ إِلَّا مُنْصِفاً وَلَا تُرْشِدَنَّ إِلَّا مُسْتَرْشِداً
enWisdom: Never debate except with one who is fair and never guide anyone but the seeker of guidance

Wisdom: لَا تُجْرِ لِسَانَكَ إِلَّا بِمَا يُكْتَبُ لَكَ أَجْرُهُ وَيُجْمِلُ عَنْكَ نَشْرُهُ
enWisdom: Do not move your tongue except to say that which will earn you reward and that which behoves you to speak [of] openly
